data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ahyong, Shane T., Boyko, Christopher B. (2019): Rhopalione kali sp. nov., first known epicaridean parasite on the Malaysian pinnotherid crab, Serenotheres besutensis (Serène, 1967). Zootaxa 4590 (2): 283-288, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4590.2.5|2 occurrences
